languages.text:
"Хохотом громким тогда небеса расколол
Грозный Ульфар, что берег друзей в битве.
Челюсти волка руками он крепко порвал
И разорвал их, изгнавши злобные чары.

"Then with laugh booming
the heavens were split
by the formidable Ulfar,
his battle-friends guarding.
With a mighty wrench
the wolf's jaws he tore,
opening them wide,
the evil charms banishing.
languages.original_text:
"Хохотом громким тогда небеса расколол
Грозный Ульфар, что берег друзей в битве.
Челюсти волка руками он крепко порвал
И разорвал их, изгнавши злобные чары.

the heavens were split
by the formidable Ulfar,

With a mighty wrench

the evil charms banishing.

the heavens were split
by the formidable Ulfar,
his battle-friends guarding.
With a mighty wrench

opening them wide,

"Хохотом громким тогда небеса расколол
Грозный Ульфар, что берег друзей в битве.
Челюсти волка руками он крепко порвал
И разорвал их, изгнавши злобные чары.

"Then with laugh booming
the heavens were split
by the formidable Ulfar,
his battle-friends guarding.
With a mighty wrench
the wolf's jaws he tore,
opening them wide,
the evil charms banishing.

languages.text:
「その時、爆笑とともに
彼の戦友たちの守りに支えられ
恐ろしいウルファーによって
天が裂けた。
すさまじい一撃で
狼の顎を引き裂き
大きく開口させ
邪悪な呪いは消え去った。
languages.original_text:
"Then with laugh booming
the heavens were split
by the formidable Ulfar,
his battle-friends guarding.
With a mighty wrench
the wolf's jaws he tore,
opening them wide,
the evil charms banishing.

traits.locale_text:
「その時、爆笑とともに
彼の戦友たちの守りに支えられ
恐ろしいウルファーによって
天が裂けた。
すさまじい一撃で
狼の顎を引き裂き
大きく開口させ
邪悪な呪いは消え去った。

languages.text:
“伴随着震天的狂笑，
所向披靡的乌尔法，
在战友的掩护下，
以无匹的巨力，
抓住了恶狼的下颚，
用力向外一撕，
邪恶的魔力就此灰飞烟灭。”
languages.original_text:
"Then with laugh booming
the heavens were split
by the formidable Ulfar,
his battle-friends guarding.
With a mighty wrench
the wolf's jaws he tore,
opening them wide,
the evil charms banishing.

traits.locale_text:
“伴随着震天的狂笑，
所向披靡的乌尔法，
在战友的掩护下，
以无匹的巨力，
抓住了恶狼的下颚，
用力向外一撕，
邪恶的魔力就此灰飞烟灭。”

languages.text:
« Les cieux furent éventrés
par le rire tonitruant d'Ulfar,
gardien infatigable
de tous ses frères d'armes.
Disloquant avec force
les mâchoires du loup,
il dissipa pour de bon
ses charmes maléfiques. »
languages.original_text:
"Then with laugh booming
the heavens were split
by the formidable Ulfar,
his battle-friends guarding.
With a mighty wrench
the wolf's jaws he tore,
opening them wide,
the evil charms banishing.

traits.locale_text:
« Les cieux furent éventrés
par le rire tonitruant d'Ulfar,
gardien infatigable
de tous ses frères d'armes.
Disloquant avec force
les mâchoires du loup,
il dissipa pour de bon
ses charmes maléfiques. »

languages.text:
«Después, con su risa atronadora,
los cielos resquebrajó
el formidable Ulfar,
protector de sus hermanos de batalla.
De un vigoroso tirón
las fauces del lobo arrancó,
abriéndolas por completo
para expulsar al espíritu perverso».
languages.original_text:
"Then with laugh booming
the heavens were split
by the formidable Ulfar,
his battle-friends guarding.
With a mighty wrench
the wolf's jaws he tore,
opening them wide,
the evil charms banishing.

traits.locale_text:

los cielos resquebrajó

protector de sus hermanos de batalla.
De un vigoroso tirón
las fauces del lobo arrancó,
abriéndolas por completo
para expulsar al espíritu perverso».

languages.text:
"Dann spaltete der formidable Ulfar
durch sein dröhnendes Lachen
die Himmel,
als seine Kampfesbrüder er beschützte.
Mit einem mächtigen Ruck
zerriss er den Kiefer des Wolfs,
riss ihn weit auf,
verbannte die bösen Zauber.
languages.original_text:
"Then with laugh booming
the heavens were split
by the formidable Ulfar,
his battle-friends guarding.
With a mighty wrench
the wolf's jaws he tore,
opening them wide,
the evil charms banishing.

Mit einem mächtigen Ruck

languages.text:
"Patlayan bir kahkaha misali
Göklerde delik açıldı.
Yoldaşlarının koruduğu
Ulfar'dı bunu yapan.
Sertçe eğip büktü ve
Yırttı kurdun çenesini.
Açtı alabildiğine,
Kötücül tılsımları defetti.
languages.original_text:
"Then with laugh booming
the heavens were split
by the formidable Ulfar,
his battle-friends guarding.
With a mighty wrench
the wolf's jaws he tore,
opening them wide,
the evil charms banishing.

traits.locale_text:
"Patlayan kahkahayla
delindi gökler
savaş dostlarının koruduğu
heybetli Ulfar'ın elinden.
Sertçe eğip bükerek
yırttı kurdun çenesini
açtı alabildiğine,
defetti kötücül tılsımları.
